1591080.name: BETA: IVRy Monado Tracker for SteamVR
1591080.description:
What is the iVRy Monado Tracker for SteamVR DLC?


• It is a tracking-only version of the Monado Linux OpenXR software that has been ported to Windows and customised to simplify installation and configuration for use with the iVRy Driver for SteamVR.

What does that mean?


• Want to use your Sony Playstation PSVR and Move controllers to play PC VR* (Virtual Reality) titles?
• Want to add 6DOF (orientation & positional) tracking to your PSVR headset?
• With iVRy, the Monado Tracker for SteamVR and a Sony Playstation 4 camera** you can!

* Valve OpenVR/SteamVR. Requires Valve Steam & SteamVR on Windows 7 or later.
** Sony Playstation 4 camera requires Sony PS5 camera adapter or equivalent.
